issue.title: [C++] Validate or add option to validate arrow::Table schema in parquet::arrow::FileWriter::WriteTable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3770](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3770). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Failing to validate will cause a segfault when the passed table does not match the schema used to instantiate the writer. See ARROW-2926
